betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The use of treasures greatly speeds up the player's access to research: different treasures increase the specialization of research in different ways. \Arcane: Occult, obtained by digging up secret crystals. 
True Heirloom: Alchemy, obtained by mining Amber Ore. 
The Twisted Truth: Alchemy, obtained by slaying corrupted creatures. 
Ancient Treasures: Puppetry, probability of refreshing on the loot pedestal of the Spire of Evil. 
Treasure of Light: Arcane Magic, obtained by trading with Rock Goblins. 
Evil art treasure: Evil art science, use it to get twisted, kill evil guards to get it. 
 Rock Goblin Staff: unbiased, trade with Rock Goblin Mage to obtain. 
Bloody Manual: Evil Science, use will gain distortion, obtain by slaying a Bloody Cultist. 

Additionally, using weapons/tools enchanted with "Knowledge", kill/excavate creatures/cubes for a chance to get any rare item.
